The first year required the study of foundations of mathematics, physics, computer science, computer networks and electronics. The second year required the study of advanced mathematics and physics, and the fundamentals of electronic systems.

testimonials.text: Ishmael(ishasir) has a great mentality that always seeks to improve his skills. His discipline makes working with him easy and challenging at the same time. He loves to share his ideas and accomplishments with other people, which makes him very easily leave an impact in any working environment.
testimonials.user: Jeremiah George  | Software Engineer - Full Stack Django developer.

testimonials.text: Ishmael is detailed orientated, has advanced system engineering and problem-solving skills. He has the ability to effectively manage several tasks at a time.
testimonials.user: Charles Masoud | Lecturer at Pwani University.
